content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 1, South China 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 1, South China 0.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Micah Richards (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Substitution, Manchester City. Scott Sinclair replaces Edin Dzeko.
Substitution, Manchester City. Micah Richards replaces Pablo Zabaleta.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Chak Ting Fung.
Jack Rodwell (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Aender Naves (South China).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Dhiego Martins.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Joel.
Attempt blocked. Samir Nasri (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by James Milner.
Attempt blocked. Michael Luk (South China) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Hand ball by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Foul by Samir Nasri (Manchester City).
Chak Ting Fung (South China) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Dhiego Martins (South China) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. James Milner (Manchester City) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is just a bit too high. Assisted by Javi García.
Substitution, Manchester City. Javi García replaces Fernandinho.
Substitution, South China. Michael Luk replaces Jack Sealy.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Chunhui Zhang.
Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Álvaro Negredo with a through ball.
Offside, South China. Sean Tse tries a through ball, but Mamadou Barry is caught offside.
Jack Sealy (South China) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edin Dzeko (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Álvaro Negredo (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross.
Foul by Aender Naves (South China).
Jack Rodwell (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jack Rodwell replaces Gareth Barry.
Substitution, Manchester City. Álvaro Negredo replaces Yaya Touré.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Joel.
Substitution, South China. Hong Lim Lee replaces Wai Lim Lee.
Foul by Chak Ting Fung (South China).
James Milner (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Joel.
Attempt blocked. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by James Milner.
James Milner (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aender Naves (South China).
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Substitution, Manchester City. Aleksandar Kolarov replaces Gaël Clichy.
Second Half begins Manchester City 1, South China 0.
Substitution, South China. Dhiego Martins replaces Lai Hin Cheng.
First Half ends, Manchester City 1, South China 0.
Offside, Manchester City. Yaya Touré tries a through ball, but Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Sean Tse.
Foul by Joleon Lescott (Manchester City).
Ticão (South China) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Jack Sealy.
Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Ticão (South China) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Samir Nasri (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Chak Ting Fung (South China).
Jack Sealy (South China) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by James Milner (Manchester City).
Goal!  Manchester City 1, South China 0. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) header from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by James Milner with a cross.
Offside, South China. Chak Ting Fung tries a through ball, but Lai Hin Cheng is caught offside.
Foul by Gaël Clichy (Manchester City).
Ticão (South China) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  South China. Conceded by Joleon Lescott.
Attempt saved. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Milner with a cross.
Attempt saved. James Milner (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Gareth Barry with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Kin Pong Kwok.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Kin Pong Kwok.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mamadou Barry (South China).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
